Apu Nahasapeemapetilon
Apu Nahasapeemapetilon is a cartoon character in the animated television series The Simpsons. He is the Indian immigrant proprietor of the Kwik-E-Mart, a popular convenience store in Springfield, and is well known for his catchphrase, "Thank you, come again."
